CustomField.formula: IF((ISPICKVAL(Repair_Status__c , "Total Loss")),( Approved_Estimate__c + X1st_Supplement__c + X2nd_Supplement__c + X3rd_Supplement__c + Consulting_Fee__c + TL_Admin_fee__c + TL_Estimate_Fee__c + Storage_Fee__c ),(Approved_Estimate__c + X1st_Supplement__c + X2nd_Supplement__c + X3rd_Supplement__c))
CustomField.label: Total Amount Receivable
